## WorkspaceCommentSvg.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `WorkspaceCommentSvg` class

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(workspace: WorkspaceSvg, content: string, height: number, width: number, opt_id?: string);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  workspace | [WorkspaceSvg](./blockly.workspacesvg_class.md) | The block's workspace. |
|  content | string | The content of this workspace comment. |
|  height | number | Height of the comment. |
|  width | number | Width of the comment. |
|  opt\_id | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Optional ID. Use this ID if provided, otherwise create a new ID. |
